channel.title: Overview on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Security365 Docs

item.title: Get started
item.description: Get started with Cache ​​ Learn the basics Discover the benefits of caching with Cloudflare’s CDN and understand the default cache behavior. What is a CDN? External link icon Open external link Understand the default file types Cloudflare caches ​​ Make more resources cacheable Configure your settings to cache static HTML or cache anonymous page views of dynamic content. Speed up your site with caching best practices External link icon Open external link Specify which resources to cache Understand Origin Cache Control Cache by device type (Enterprise only) ​​ Improve cache hit rates Include or exclude query strings, optimize cache keys, or enable tiered cache to improve hit rates and reduce traffic to your origin.
